last_episode_to_air.name: Making Magic
last_episode_to_air.overview: A field trip to the center of the sun takes a dangerous detour when the school's safety-conscious principal, Mr. Ruhle, tags along.

name: The Magic School Bus Rides Again
original_name: The Magic School Bus Rides Again
overview: Ms. Frizzle's sister takes her class on a slew of wild science adventures in this update of the beloved animated show.

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview: The Magic School Bus pulls out all the stops, taking Ms. Frizzle and the class to the top of a noodle mountain -- and the center of the sun itself.

episodes.name: Frizzle of the Future
episodes.overview: Change is good for everyone except Arnold, who's worried that a new teacher - Ms. Frizzle's young sister - will alter the class's "ecosystem".

episodes.name: Pigs in the Wind
episodes.overview: A field trip to the world's windiest mountain helps Keesha and the class strengthen a set piece for a sequel to "The Three Little Pigs".

episodes.name: In the Swim
episodes.overview: Ms. Frizzle takes the class to Hawaii where an overprotecting Wanda gets schooled when she's forced to think like a tiny little fish.

episodes.name: The Battle of Rock Mountain
episodes.overview: Tim pens an original comic book for the school's upcoming time capsule ceremony that pits Weatherman against Captain Rock Man. But who will win?

episodes.name: The Magnetic Mambo
episodes.overview: While visiting a mountain made of magnetite, Ralphie and the class shrink to subatomic size to get some hot tips for their disorganized dance troupe.

episodes.name: Carlos Gets the Sneezes
episodes.overview: Carlos plans to convince the principal to let the students keep a pet rat in the classroom. But first, he'll have to stop sneezing.

episodes.name: Hides and Seeks
episodes.overview: Determined to outwit an old rival, DA applies the art of animal camouflage to a schoolwide game of extreme hide-and-seek.

episodes.name: Three in One
episodes.overview: A lesson on water and its three basic forms -- solid, liquid and gas -- inspires Jyoti's submission for a "3-in-1 Gizmo That Goes" contest.

episodes.name: Space Mission: Selfie
episodes.overview: An out-of-this world class trip takes the students up into space, where a selfie-obsessed Keesha accidentally sparks disaster.

episodes.name: The Tales Glaciers Tell
episodes.overview: An icy glacier's eye-opening birth story helps a data-driven DA -- who's not one for public speaking -- deliver a talk to a sold-out crowd.

episodes.name: Ralphie Strikes a Nerve
episodes.overview: The class constructs a giant robot with help from brainy scientist Dr. Sarah Bellum, then takes a look inside Ralphie's nervous system.

episodes.name: Monster Power
episodes.overview: A skittish Arnold looks to alternative energy sources to help keep his fears at bay while camping outdoors with Ms. Frizzle and the class.

episodes.name: DA and the Deep Blue Sea
episodes.overview: Ms. Frizzle turns the Magic School Bus into a submarine to take the class into the ocean's darkest depths and retrieve Jyoti's high-tech locket.

episodes.name: The Land Before Tim
episodes.overview: When the class gets an invite to compete on Tim's favorite TV game show, the bus takes them all back in time to bone up on how fossils are formed.

episodes.name: Claw and Order
episodes.overview: From scratch marks to stolen pepperoni slices, the science classroom's a mess -- and all clues seem to point to Wanda's bird friend, Marty the Magpie.

episodes.name: Ghost Farm
episodes.overview: Wanda's been so busy planning this year's Fall Fun Feast that she forgot about the food. Now her only hope is a farm that's supposedly haunted. Gulp!

episodes.name: Nothin' But Net
episodes.overview: Ms. Frizzle and the class race across the internet to recover a digitized Arnold before Jyoti's grandmother accidentally deletes him.

episodes.name: I Spy with my Animal Eyes
episodes.overview: The kids learn to see the world through the eyes of different animals when a careless Arnold loses Carlos's pet rat -- then turns her invisible!

episodes.name: Ready, Set, Fail!
episodes.overview: While building (and rebuilding) their own space rover to tackle the terrain on a faraway planet, Jyoti and the class learn that it's OK to fail.

episodes.name: The Good, the Bad and the Gnocchi
episodes.overview: A race between competitive brothers Carlos and Mikey takes the gang to the top of an in-pasta-ble mountain, where they learn about simple machines.

episodes.name: Send in the Clouds
episodes.overview: The kids go looking for rain to test out Jyoti's latest invention, "The Autobrella," only to wind up with their heads stuck in the clouds.

episodes.name: Ralphie and the Flying Tennellis
episodes.overview: A little math helps Ralphie make complicated midair calculations when his cousins recruit him to join their high-flying circus act.

episodes.name: Tim and the Talking Trees
episodes.overview: Ralphie doesn't believe Tim when he tells him that trees can talk, so Ms. Frizzle takes the class to a forest that's louder than it looks.

episodes.name: Waste Not, Want Not
episodes.overview: Every person and animal poops. But the class isn't convinced that this so-called "brown gold" is as valuable as DA's famous inventor uncle says it is.

episodes.name: Janet's Mystery Gene
episodes.overview: The bus takes Ms. Frizzle and the class deep inside Arnold's cousin Janet to learn why our genes makes us look, act and feel the way we do.

episodes.name: Making Magic
episodes.overview: A field trip to the center of the sun takes a dangerous detour when the school's safety-conscious principal, Mr. Ruhle, tags along.

2.name: Season 2
2.overview: The Magic School Bus pulls out all the stops, taking Ms. Frizzle and the class to the top of a noodle mountain -- and the center of the sun itself.
